title: La Vida De Valentina
overview: Growing up fascinated by telenovelas, Valentina has always been a little bit extra when it comes to living La Vida. Winner of Miss Congeniality from RuPaul's Drag Race season 9, Valentina's lovable personality shines through as she shares intimate details about her life such as her first kiss and her fear of driving, all told in the style of a telenovela.
